eventTypeId.description: The Cal.com event type ID for the service being booked (e.g., 123456 for a specific appointment type)

startTime.description: The start time of the booking in ISO 8601 format with timezone (e.g., 2025-12-18T14:00:00Z)

attendeeName.description: Full name of the customer making the booking

attendeePhone.description: Customer's phone number in E164 format (e.g., +15551234567). Required for booking.

attendeeEmail.description: Email address of the customer making the booking. Optional - if not provided, system will auto-generate from phone number.

timezone.description: IANA timezone string for the booking (e.g., America/New_York, Europe/London). Defaults to UTC if not provided.

metadata.description: Optional custom fields for the booking (e.g., {"serviceType": "Haircut", "notes": "First time customer"})

guests.description: Optional list of additional guest email addresses to invite to the booking

lengthInMinutes.description: Optional duration of the booking in minutes. If not provided, uses the event type's default duration.
